main_intro: Use our Patient Portal to track your progress, keep up-to-date with our latest news, view your documents and exercises, complete your online health assessment questionnaires, manage your appointments and more.
appointmentsActionRequired: You have actions awaiting your attention on the appointments page.
documentsNoActionRequired: There are currently no documents to view.
questionnairesActionRequired: You have an outstanding digital assessment to complete.
questionnairesNoActionRequired: There are currently no digital assessments to complete.
exercisesNoActionRequired: There are currently no exercises to complete.
requestAppointmentMessage: You can request your next appointment with us by clicking on this banner.
nhsNumberNotFound: We can't find your NHS number on our system
